DOC.brief_summary: This will be a double-blind randomized clinical trial carried out on subjects with suboptimal control of LDL-cholesterolemia, following a Mediterranean diet, and treated with a red yeast rice extract (containing 10 mg monacolin K per daily dose) or placebo, in order to evaluate the middle-term effects on vascular health evaluated by non invasive methods (Vicorder(R) apparatus)
DOC.brief_title: Effects of 10 mg Monacolins on Vascular Health: a Clinical Trial
DOC.criteria: LDLcholesterol between 130 and 190 mg/dL Secundary prevention for cardiovascular disease Type 2 diabetes Assumption of lipidlowering drug or dietary supplements Previous intolerans to read yeast rice including dietary supplements
